question.text: Which of the following description of eye colour is true for fruit fly?

options.text: White eye colour is dominant over red eye colour and its gene is located on autosome.
Red eye colour is dominant over white eye colour and its gene is located on autosome.
White eye colour is dominant over red eye colour and its gene is located on the X chromosome.
Red eye colour is dominant over white eye colour and its gene is located on the X chromosome.

solution.text: In Drosophila melanogaster, the genes for eye colour as well as body colour is located on X chromosomes. Red-eye colour is dominant while white eye colour is recessive. Brown body colour is dominant while yellow body colour is recessive. These two genes were used by Morgan to study linkage
